doc:
Ben Turpin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ben_Turpin 0 Bernard "Ben" Turpin (September 19, 1869 – July 1, 1940) was an American comedian and actor, best remembered for his work in silent films. His trademarks were his cross-eyed appearance and adeptness at vigorous physical comedy. Turpin worked with notable performers such as Charlie Chaplin and Laurel and Hardy, and was a part of the Mack Sennett studio team. He is believed to have been the first filmed "victim" of the pie in the face gag. When sound came to films, Turpin chose to retire, having invested profitably in real estate, although he did do occasional cameos. Bernard_"_Ben_"_Turpin ( September_19_,_1869 – July_1_,_1940 ) was an_American_comedian_and_actor , best remembered for his_work in silent_films . When sound came to films , Turpin chose_to_retire , having_invested profitably in real_estate , although he did_do occasional_cameos .
